title: huge ping spike
body: i need your help community, i haven't played the game for a week or so and i just opened it yesterday, but something weird was happening, whenever i try to hit an enemy player or even get close to them my ping spikes horribly, like over 2k sometimes and everyone freeze like they all stopped playing,and when it comes back i find myself dead, i hate that

replies.body: Eeeeeee you mentioned your champion was totally freezing and then poof you're dead? That sounds a lot like packet loss to me, which means that your connection is getting corrupted somehow along the way to our servers. Check out this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) with those network logs, take a screenshot and post it here so we can go over it together.
